svg.content: <mxfile host="app.diagrams.net" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10.15; rv:129.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/129.0" version="24.7.7" scale="1" border="0"> <diagram name="Page-1" id="ErXrXTfX9uddqSycfQAO"> <mxGraphModel dx="1234" dy="1154" grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="850" pageHeight="1100" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="1" parent="0" /> <mxCell id="CdqtduoqXQhKpZlldJTo-3" value="IPv6 /32 Prefix" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;" edge="1" parent="1" source="CdqtduoqXQhKpZlldJTo-1" target="CdqtduoqXQhKpZlldJTo-2"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="CdqtduoqXQhKpZlldJTo-1" value="Internet" style="ellipse;shape=cloud;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="250" y="80" width="120" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="CdqtduoqXQhKpZlldJTo-2" value="ISP delegating router" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;shape=mxgraph.basic.cloud_rect" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="263.34" y="210" width="93.33" height="70" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="CdqtduoqXQhKpZlldJTo-5" value="<div>Home Router/Gateway</div><div>OPNSense<br></div>" style="sketch=0;aspect=fixed;pointerEvents=1;shadow=0;dashed=0;html=1;strokeColor=none;labelPosition=left;verticalLabelPosition=middle;verticalAlign=middle;align=right;fillColor=#00188D;shape=mxgraph.mscae.enterprise.router" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="265.13" y="390" width="89.74" height="70" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="CdqtduoqXQhKpZlldJTo-7" value="<div>WAN</div><div>Interface<br></div>" style="outlineConnect=0;dashed=0;verticalLabelPosition=middle;verticalAlign=middle;align=right;html=1;shape=mxgraph.aws3.elastic_network_interface;fillColor=#F58534;gradientColor=none;labelPosition=left;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="285.5" y="330" width="49" height="51.13" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="CdqtduoqXQhKpZlldJTo-8" value="<div>IPv6 /48</div><div>Delegated Prefix</div>" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;entryPerimeter=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="CdqtduoqXQhKpZlldJTo-2" target="CdqtduoqXQhKpZlldJTo-7"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="CdqtduoqXQhKpZlldJTo-9" value="<div>LAN</div><div>Interface</div><div>/64 Internally</div><div>Delegated Prefix<br></div><div><br></div><div>DHCPv6 but</div><div>not in RA<br></div>" style="outlineConnect=0;dashed=0;verticalLabelPosition=bottom;verticalAlign=top;align=center;html=1;shape=mxgraph.aws3.elastic_network_interface;fillColor=#F58534;gradientColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="360" y="400" width="47.92" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="CdqtduoqXQhKpZlldJTo-11" value="SLAAC" style="outlineConnect=0;dashed=0;verticalLabelPosition=bottom;verticalAlign=top;align=center;html=1;shape=mxgraph.aws3.elastic_network_interface;fillColor=#F58534;gradientColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="540" y="350" width="47.92" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="CdqtduoqXQhKpZlldJTo-12" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=1;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;entryPerimeter=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="CdqtduoqXQhKpZlldJTo-11" target="CdqtduoqXQhKpZlldJTo-9"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="CdqtduoqXQhKpZlldJTo-14" value="<div>Desktop/consumer</div><div>devices<br></div>" style="image;points=[];aspect=fixed;html=1;align=left;shadow=0;dashed=0;image=img/lib/allied_telesis/computer_and_terminals/Personal_Computer_with_Server.svg;labelPosition=right;verticalLabelPosition=middle;verticalAlign=middle;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="587.92" y="336.90000000000003" width="76.2" height="76.2" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="CdqtduoqXQhKpZlldJTo-15" value="Kubernetes Node" style="fontColor=#0066CC;verticalAlign=middle;verticalLabelPosition=middle;labelPosition=right;align=left;html=1;outlineConnect=0;fillColor=#CCCCCC;strokeColor=#6881B3;gradientColor=none;gradientDirection=north;strokeWidth=2;shape=mxgraph.networks.desktop_pc;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="601.02" y="480" width="30" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="CdqtduoqXQhKpZlldJTo-16" value="<div>SLAAC for</div><div>host IP</div><div>Delegated /64 Prefix<br></div><div>Pod IPv6 addresses<br></div>" style="outlineConnect=0;dashed=0;verticalLabelPosition=bottom;verticalAlign=top;align=center;html=1;shape=mxgraph.aws3.elastic_network_interface;fillColor=#F58534;gradientColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="540" y="485" width="47.92" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="CdqtduoqXQhKpZlldJTo-18" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=1;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;entryPerimeter=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="CdqtduoqXQhKpZlldJTo-16" target="CdqtduoqXQhKpZlldJTo-9"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="CdqtduoqXQhKpZlldJTo-19" value="<div>Pod CIDR from</div><div>delegated prefix<br></div>" style="shape=ext;double=1;rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;labelPosition=center;verticalLabelPosition=bottom;align=center;verticalAlign=top;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="650" y="535" width="120" height="135" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="CdqtduoqXQhKpZlldJTo-20" value="<div>GUA IPv6 address</div><div>from pod CIDR</div><div>and CNI<br></div>" style="aspect=fixed;sketch=0;html=1;dashed=0;whitespace=wrap;verticalLabelPosition=bottom;verticalAlign=top;fillColor=#2875E2;strokeColor=#ffffff;points=[[0.005,0.63,0],[0.1,0.2,0],[0.9,0.2,0],[0.5,0,0],[0.995,0.63,0],[0.72,0.99,0],[0.5,1,0],[0.28,0.99,0]];shape=mxgraph.kubernetes.icon2;kubernetesLabel=1;prIcon=pod" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="678.75" y="550" width="62.5" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="CdqtduoqXQhKpZlldJTo-21" value="1. Node host receives RA with no DHCP markings<br>2. Node host configures SLAAC GUA IPv6 address<br>3. Special DHCPv6 client is started in solicit mode.<br>4. Special client negotiates /64 prefix.<br>5. Delegating router adds routing rule for the additional, newly delegated prefix to the LAN interface.<br>6. Special client adds kubelet drop-in configuration file, which sets pod CIDR to the delegated prefix, reloads kubelet.<br>7. Pods are now assigned GUA IPv6 addresses from the /64 delegation.<br>8. CNI adds pod IPs to the host interface.<br>9. As per routing rules on the delegating router, traffic is sent to the LAN interface, and the node's interface receives traffic for those pods, as the IPs are assigned to the interface.<div><br/></div>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="380" y="105" width="660" height="225" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

div.div:
1. Node host receives RA with no DHCP markings
2. Node host configures SLAAC GUA IPv6 address
3. Special DHCPv6 client is started in solicit mode.
4. Special client negotiates /64 prefix.
5. Delegating router adds routing rule for the additional, newly delegated prefix to the LAN interface.
6. Special client adds kubelet drop-in configuration file, which sets pod CIDR to the delegated prefix, reloads kubelet.
7. Pods are now assigned GUA IPv6 addresses from the /64 delegation.
8. CNI adds pod IPs to the host interface.
9. As per routing rules on the delegating router, traffic is sent to the LAN interface, and the node's interface receives traffic for those pods, as the IPs are assigned to the interface.

switch.text: 1. Node host receives RA with no DHCP markings...
